channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Motorbiking; Breakfast Club: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Science Museum; Clubhouse Adventure: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Miss Rabbit's Relaxation Class; Mountain Climbing: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: A fire breathing dragon comes to life in 'Pups Save a Dragon', and in 'Pups Save the Three Little Pigs', the Paw Patrol help three little pigs build new houses after theirs mysteriously disappear.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Being Babies: Peppa and Rebecca Rabbit pretend to be babies to get Mummy Rabbit's attention. Mummy Rabbit plays along until they admit they are not really babies.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Mr Cat's Cafe: Peppa is on a play date with Candy Cat at Mr Cat's Cafe. Candy show Mr Cat the drawings they've done of everyone, and he hangs them up for everyone to see.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Cushion Den; Staying Up Late: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Hot Dry Day: Peppa and George are playing in their pool. They help the garden animals cool down but when it rains, the animals are happy and so is Peppa. Rain makes muddy puddles for jumping in.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: New TV: Peppa and family are watching TV. until it breaks! While Grampy Rabbit fixes it, the family get a new TV which can do everything. but it doesn't beat their old TV.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Folk Music Band; Calling Kylie: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: House Rules; Big Announcement: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Grandpa's Robot: Grandpa is building something in his shed. It is his latest pet project. It's a robot called Frank.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Indoor Adventure: A storm cancels Peppa and her family's adventure plans so they decide to take it inside. Using their imagination, they go sledding, climb a mountain and have a campfire in the attic.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Uncle Gaston: Three baby ladybirds, Amber, Emerald and Keith have come to stay at Uncle Gaston's for the day. The baby ladybirds are exhausting! So Ben and Holly help Gaston to keep them entertained.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Nanny Plum's Lesson: Nanny Plum is teaching the fairy girls some important fairy rules when she is blown away, trapped in a tree, dropped in a stream and covered in mud.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Woodpecker: King Thistle is bored and takes up the hobby of bird watching. Using his magic bird book, the King is pleased when another creature makes a nest in the Royal Castle.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Plumbing: The bath tap at the Little Castle is dripping, so the elf plumber is called. It's a bigger job than first expected, but with King and Queen Marigolds coming round, there's not much time.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Soft Play: It's Richard Rabbit's birthday party and George is invited, and that can only mean one thing; Soft Play.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The Market: Peppa and family find some great things to buy from the market and even get a special gift from Mr. Fox's stall.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The Castle: Mummy and Daddy Pig take Peppa and George to a castle to feast on medieval banquets, play King and Queen and even meet a dragon. It's George's favourite day ever.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Parachute Jump: When the school roof is broken and needs fixing, Peppa volunteers Mummy Pig to do a parachute jump to raise money. Daddy Pig goes up too and has to overcome his fear of heights.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Granny Sheep Moves In; Cardboard Boxes; Clubhouse Takeaway; Walkie Talkies; Peppa's Office; Little Swift; What Babies Do; Lenses: Eight episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Clubhouse Takeaway; Walkie Talkies; Peppa's Office; Little Swift; What Babies Do; Lenses: Six episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: The Magical Mermaid-lantis: It's the big Mermaid Sparkle Party in Mermaid-lantis! But when the grumpy Kitty Squiddy tries to ruin the party for everyone, Gabby and Pandy must save the day. (S3, ep 13).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Paddington seeks Captain Green Beard's loot in 'Paddington's Pirate Treasure Hunt', then in 'Paddington's Sandcastle Showstopper', everyone is keen to win the sandcastle competition! (S3, ep 10).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Some pufflings get lost in 'Paddington's Puffling Rescue', then in 'Paddington Goes Under The Sea', Paddington enjoys a diving adventure with Jonathan and Judy - but where is her necklace? (S3, ep 11).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: The beach is a mess until 'Paddington's Beach Clean Up', then in 'Paddington's Holiday Farewell', the summer holidays have come to an end, so it's time to say goodbye to their new friends. (S3, ep 12).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Getting Ready for a Wedding; Wedding Day; Party Bus; Movie Night; Art House Day; Wildflower Wood; Sunny Day Games; Magic Trick: Eight episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Paw Patrol
channel.desc: Pups Save the Kitty Rescue Crew: Mayor Humdinger makes fake emergencies for his kitties to save so they appear better than the Paw Patrol.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Paw Patrol
channel.desc: Pups Save an Ostrich: The Wingnuts get a new pet ostrich, but it gets lost on the trip home. The PAW Patrol must find and lead it to the Wingnuts' ranch.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Paddington builds a robot in 'Paddington Meets PaddingTron', then in 'Paddington's First Diwali', Baaz invites everyone to celebrate Diwali with him and Paddington is his helpful assistant. (S3, ep 5).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Paddington has a race against time in 'Paddington and the Solar Eclipse', then in 'Paddington and the Mysterious Inventor', Simi receives an inventor's award, but why does she feel sad? (S3, ep 6).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Monkey Trees; Canoe Trip: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The Holiday; Water Park: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Dinosaur Party!; Superhero Party: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Playgroup Garden: Peppa's Playgroup has a garden outside. The children are all having fun growing different plants and playing hide and seek in the wild wood.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Real Pup Squad
channel.desc: We meet Isla and her Chihuahua, Gizmo, as they join The Real Pup Squad! Their mission? To find and rescue the lost penguins in the jungle and bring them back to safety.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora and Boots help Dulce the Dragon in 'Learning To Fly', and in 'Queen Swiper', La Reina and Swiper's bodies are switched by Big Red Chicken's magic. Dora and Boots help them switch back! (S3, ep 7).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora helps a boy band before the show in 'The Bunny Boyz', then in 'Dancing Osito', Dora gets Isabela's teddy bear back. (S3, ep 8).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Kangaroo Beach
channel.desc: Beach N Bush: Gemma and Spyke take cadets on an adventure to decide if the beach or bush is best.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Kangaroo Beach
channel.desc: Whale Song Spectacular: The cadets throw a whale concert to attract baby whales for Gemma.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: Snow Cruise: The Gabby Cats go on a cruise to see Pete the Polar Bear's new rainbow igloo. Along the way, Mercat helps them learn about all kinds of fun things that water does. (S3, ep 14).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Boots needs to rescue Isa on their 'Friendaversary Adventure', then in 'Swiper's Birthday Surprise', Dora brings a gift to a Swiper's party and must stop him from swiping his own gift! (S1, ep 5).
